ygData.subject: Re: Items you would like to see...
ygData.msgSnippet: Those are all good ideas, one I would like to add.  Armor dyeing ... if the only use for tinkering ever was armor dyeing I would consider tinkering successful.
ygData.messageBody:
Those are all good ideas, one I would like to add. Armor dyeing ... if the
only use for tinkering ever was armor dyeing I would consider tinkering
successful. It would be cool if tanks could bring there armor to us gnomes
and have us dye it cool colors. Its kinda sad that the average tank that
doesn't play in excess of 1-2 hours a day really doesn't have much of a
chance to ever wear red armor or obtain special class armor. This is off
subject but one of my favorite things about the old outdated UO was that
everyone had there own style people could billions of different color
combinations. Just my humble opinion on stuff I care about.

Roj
